website_summaries.verdict: While Symantec's protection is solid, the overall user experience within Norton Internet Security 2008 could be much, much better. Not all the features work together, and the program could use fewer system resources. We can also do without the addition of paid services within the technical support section.
pros: Norton Internet Security 2008 offers solid protection for your desktop
cons: The Norton Internet Security 2008 interface is ghastly, the suite itself can slow your computer to a crawl, its feature set doesn't integrate well, and Symantec is once again offering fee-based services under the guise of technical support

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain to be had
customer_reviews.text: This old version of the Norton Antivirus software is a real bargain to be had. You see, I actually prefer the old 2008 version to use on my Windows XP PC's. A bonus is that if you you choose to, it offers you an upgrade to the very latest version of NAV. So it's a real deal. Since I am already using NAV 2008, I just use the product key from the CD jacket to update my subscription. You don't even have to install it over and over again. Just purchase another one to extend your subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you want to slow down your computer!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from McAffee antivirus protection to Norton this year and found out I don't like either option. The Norton 2008 requires so much memory to run that it will slow down your computer dramatically. It will run slower online and offline. It stops viruses as well as I expected, but it makes everything slow and annoying. Even though I paid for a year of protection, I uninstalled it and bought a different program. Trend Micro hasn't slowed our computer down at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Norton Antivirus 2008 Image Error
customer_reviews.text: I have used Norton Antivirus for a number of years and found it the best available. I usually wait until there is a discount, either online or from a local retail store. Unfortunately, the image shown on the Amazon site, when I placed my order, showed a mail-in discount on the front cover. I placed my order and was disappointed that there was no mail-in discount included. However, I was happy that I did save $10 over Norton's website price and my local retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Photon713

customer_reviews.title: Caused my system to crash repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: I've used Norton products for over a decade, including previous versions of Norton Anti-Virus. I've been generally pleased with them, so when my wife bought a new PC (a Dell Vostro laptop with Windows Vista), I purchased Norton Anti-Virus 2008. I was able to install it just fine and the PC ran OK for a few days. But then it started freezing up and crashing regularly. My wife lived with it for another week before giving up. We uninstalled Norton and installed Webroot AntiVirus with Antispyware. The PC has not crashed since then. I don't plan to purchase another Norton product.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Not enough information
customer_reviews.text: I got the product just fine, but it was not right for my computer. I am not very computer savvy and I wish the description on Amazon had been clearer, maybe written with a layperson in mind..not for a techie, so I would have known that this wasn't going to work with my operating system. I ended up giving it to a friend of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Skydog

customer_reviews.title: Best known but not best for use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the widespread brand awareness and assumption that the well-known brand meant it was a good product. The user menus lack intuitiveness and it's hard to guess how to change settings, etc. Additionally, it slowed down my PC significantly.
customer_reviews.author: bobkap

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain
customer_reviews.text: This old version of NAV is a real bargain. The reason it is such a deal is that after you install this old version, you are immediately eligible for a free upgrade to their latest version. A real savings!
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: A bargain to be had
customer_reviews.text: This product is a real bargain to be had. You can buy this old version and as soon as you install it, you can upgrade for free to the latest one.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: This is a good antivirus program.
customer_reviews.text: As always Norton makes a good product. I did have problems downloading it to my computer but the second time it worked. The price was right and the seller got the product to me in a rapid manner.
customer_reviews.author: Merle J. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Thanks gor a great Amazon transaction!  A++++++
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to pay full price, you can always buy a year old copy and use the install code to get the latest version.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gee

customer_reviews.title: No Problems as Yet
customer_reviews.text: Had the latest Norton professionally installed by our commercial computer service with extra care to erase all remnants of its predecessor. No problems have emerged after one month of activity.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Mead

customer_reviews.title: Does what it ought to
customer_reviews.text: I read a couple of really weird reviews of Norton 2008. I only had to re-press one of the steps, and I may have missed it myself. It works. Nothing has gone wrong with Windows xp. What more can you say? J
customer_reviews.author: J. Kadner

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT install without XP Service Pack 2
customer_reviews.text: The tech specs say that Windows XP Pro is sufficient. WRONG! Windows XP Pro is insufficient unless Service Pack 2 has been installed. Neither of my two laptops will accept Service Pack 2, so this product is useless to me. False advertising!
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: 2008, what a good year
customer_reviews.text: Too bad software is not like fine wine. However in 2009 this was perfect. Wow five more words.... What can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Jammy DeSousa

customer_reviews.title: I had preferred to unload it in line.
customer_reviews.text: The box is very great for the content that takes. I had preferred to unload it in line and to burn the file in a CD. (difference does not exist) the antivirus is efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Alb. Chacon

product_meta.title: Norton Antivirus 2008 1 User [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description:
Get outstanding protection from a reliable name! Norton AntiVirus 2008 protects your PC against spyware, viruses, and other Internet threats. It scans and cleans email and instant messaging attachments before they can plant malicious software on your system and before you can spread viruses and worms to others. Set-and-forget functionality delivers optimum antivirus protection right out of the box, without requiring any intervention.

AMAZON.COM
Norton AntiVirus 2008 protects your PC against spyware, viruses, and other Internet threats. It works automatically to block harmful software before it penetrates your system, cleans email and instant messaging attachments and Internet downloads, and includes automatic updates to keep you protected against newly discovered threats. Norton AntiVirus works quietly in the background, so you can use your PC without disruption. "Set-and-forget" functionality delivers optimum antivirus protection right out of the box, without requiring any intervention. Norton AntiVirus automatically checks for and installs new threat signatures and product features as they become available throughout your service subscription.

Norton AntiVirus 2008 protects your PC against spyware, viruses, and other Internet threats. 

Blocks spyware and viruses with advanced protection.
Norton AntiVirus 2008 protects your PC against spyware, viruses, and other Internet threats. It works automatically to block harmful software before it penetrates the system. 

Key Features


 * Designed to automatically detect and remove spyware, viruses, Trojan horses, and Internet worms. 
 * Helps ensure you can exchange files via email and instant messaging without worrying about threats. 
 * Smart technology runs quietly in the background to let you work and play without disruption. 
 * Enhanced performance lets you start, scan and run faster. 
 * Thorough pre-installation scan cleans out spyware and virus infections that can obstruct ordinary protection. 
 * Get help fast with free online technical support. 

Performance and User Enhancements--What's New


 * Start, scan, and run faster. Improved performance delivers an enhanced online experience. 
 * Get help fast with free online technical support via live chat and email all from within the product. 
 * SONAR (Symantec Online Network for Advanced Response) technology delivers behavior-based protection that can detect emerging spyware and viruses even before traditional signature-based definitions are available. 
 * Optimized product design improves scan times and decreases impact on system startup and resource usage. 

Protects your computer by automatically detecting and removing spyware, viruses, Trojan horses, and Internet worms. 

Antivirus and Antispyware Protection


 * Protects your computer by automatically detecting and removing spyware, viruses, Trojan horses, and Internet worms. 
 * Exchange files via email and instant messaging without worrying about receiving threats on your computer or spreading them to others. 
 * New smart technology runs quietly in the background to let you work and play without disruption. 
 * Thorough pre-installation scan cleans out spyware and virus infections that can obstruct ordinary protection. 
 * Connect with confidence knowing your protection is continuously updated for one year as new spyware and viruses emerge. 
 * Threat blocking technology quietly monitors system activities to stop most spyware, viruses, and worms before they can install and cause damage on your system. 
 * Email and instant message scanning detects and removes infected attachments even if they're hidden in archives. 
 * Unsurpassed protection reliability--the only antivirus with over seven years of consecutive VirusBulletin 100% detection awards. 
 * Quick Scan automatically runs on receipt of new definitions to help ensure protection against the latest threats. 
 * Full System Scan performs a deep scan of the system and hard drive to remove existing spyware, viruses, and other threats. 

Internet Worm Protection


 * Internet Worm Protection blocks viruses, spyware, and worms without needing specific threat signatures. 

Rootkit Detection


 * Rootkit protection finds and removes threats hidden deep in the operating system. 

Continued Protection and Ease of Use


 * Includes one year of automatic definition updates, new product features, and access to updated versions of Norton AntiVirus. 
 * Includes protection updates and new product features as available throughout the renewable service period. 
 * Integrated network mapping provides a view of your home network.
feature_bullets: Protects your computer by automatically detecting and removing spyware, viruses, Trojan horses, and Internet worms
Exchange files via email and instant messaging without worrying about receiving threats on your computer or spreading them to others
Start, scan, and run faster. Improved performance delivers an enhanced online experience
Thorough pre-installation scan cleans out spyware and virus infections that can obstruct ordinary protection
Connect with confidence knowing your protection is continuously updated for one year as new spyware and viruses emerge
